amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate.

action.text: Amendment SA 2654 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2654 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 336.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2654.
Amendment SA 2654 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S13123-13124; text: CR S13123) To express the sense of the Senate.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2654 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 336.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2654 proposed by Senator Grassley.
